title: Samsung Galaxy Note 4 and Galaxy Note Edge Receiving Android 5.1.1 Update at AT&T
text: Samsung has just confirmed that two of its last year flagship smartphones will finally receive the long-awaited Android 5.1.1 Lollipop update. According to the South Korea n company, Samsung Galaxy Note 4 and Galaxy Note Edge will be getting the Lollipop upgrade mentioned earlier at AT&T, beginning October 10. These smart... Â»
